title: DATA_QUALITY_MONITORING_USAGE_HISTORY view | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Data Quality and data metric functions (DMFs) require Enterprise Edition. To inquire about upgrading, please contact
Snowflake Support.

The DATA_QUALITY_MONITORING_USAGE_HISTORY view in the ACCOUNT_USAGE schema records the daily credit consumption for data metric function
evaluations on tables in an account within the last 365 days (1 year).
Introduction to Data Quality and data metric functions
Start of the specified time range.
End of the specified time range.
Number of credits billed for data metric function evaluations on the table.
Internal/system-generated identifier for the table monitored by data metric functions.
Internal/system-generated identifier for the schema that stores the table.
Name of the schema that stores the table.
Internal/system-generated identifier for the database that stores the table.
Name of the database that stores the table.
Latency for the view may be up to 180 minutes (3 hours).
